edge_1: The main character Patience Phillips becomes the crime-fighting superheroine Catwoman after being revived by an Egyptian mau cat in the film 'Catwoman'.

edge_3: The film labored in development hell for years with Ashley Judd as the lead in 2001, but she eventually dropped out so Nicole Kidman was considered. When Warner Bros. canceled a Batman vs. Superman film scheduled for 2004, the studio decided to quickly produce Catwoman as replacement, starring Halle Berry. However, Warner Bros. mandated that the film should be separate from the Batman universe and not have the character mentioned.
